meanings.definition: A temporary protrusion of the surface of an amoeboid cell for movement and feeding.
meanings.sent1: The amoeba extended its pseudopods to reach for food.
meanings.sent2: The pseudopods of the amoeba help it move around and catch prey.
meanings.sent3: The playful amoeba used its pseudopods to give its friends a gentle poke.
meanings.sent4: Her pseudopods of curiosity reached out to explore the unknown.
meanings.sent5: The pseudopods of the amoeba wiggled like tiny fingers searching for something to eat.

meanings.definition: A false or deceptive appearance or impression.
meanings.sent1: The magician created a pseudopods of smoke to distract the audience.
meanings.sent2: The pseudopods of the mirage vanished as they approached.
meanings.sent3: The fake painting had a pseudopods of authenticity that fooled many.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was a pseudopods hiding the sadness within.
meanings.sent5: The pseudopods of the disguise fooled everyone at the masquerade ball.
